text: Cynthia Lee Harris (August 9, 1934 â€“ October 3, 2021) was an American actress. She was best known for her roles in the television series Edward & Mrs. Simpson and the sitcom Mad About You. She also appeared in the 1987 comedy movie Three Men and a Baby. Harris was born in New York City. Harris died on October 3, 2021 in New York City, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Cynthia Harris
